game.name: Faroda
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Faroda is a challenging 2D platformer game with colorful pixel-art graphics and chiptune soundtrack. Travel across the 5 islands of a remote archipelago, completing over 100 levels, collecting treasure chests and many hidden gems along the way.
